The Forge
Field Notes for Knowledge Work
about contribute streams

The Forge is an open community-reviewed publication platform dedicated to the advancement of public knowledge based on the skills, tools, and workflows that are firmly entrenched in the public domain.

Select your workshop:
  • Academic Author
  • Academic Publisher
  • Amateur Librarian
Made with plain text, markdown, & jekyll ⚒ Source code at github.com/knowledge-production/forge ⚒ Content rights managed by creators, everything else: free culture 2018
